sentences.en: Canned chickpea dip finds export markets.
sentences.cn: 罐装鹰嘴豆泥找到出口市场。

sentences.en: Chickpea, wheat, sorghum and corn are among the crops affected.
sentences.cn: 鹰嘴豆，小麦，高粱和玉米就是其中的一些受灾农作物。

sentences.en: "And falafel," she said, referring to the Fried chickpea patties, a big part of the cuisine.
sentences.cn: “还有法拉费尔(falafel)。”她说，指的是炸鹰嘴豆饼，一个主要的菜肴。
